Container.Name: MQTT Camera AI Monitor
Container.Overview: Monitor MQTT channels for trigger commands, captures high-quality images from RTSP cameras using FFmpeg, and processes them through OpenAI-compatible AI endpoints for analysis. The application supports both single and multi-image capture for advanced motion detection and temporal analysis.
Container.Category: HomeAutomation: AI: Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: mqtt camera ai ffmpeg openai motion detection image capture
Container.Requires: Expects a "config.yaml" file to be mounted at the Config File path before starting the container. See configuration details: https://github.com/Cossey/mqtt-camera-ai-monitor/blob/main/config.yaml.sample
